.@HouseGOP has betrayed the American people today. Now more than ever we need the resistance as we turn our sights to the Senate to stop the #GOPTaxScam once and for all.

This #GOPTaxScam would “expand” the child tax credit to the rich while excluding 23 million children in low-income households – including 4.6 million African American children. @HouseGOP - stealing from poor kids is heartless.

This bill is a disgrace. It eliminates deductions for student loans & medical expenses. And it sets the stage for a trillion dollar cut to Medicaid and Medicare. All in order to deliver a massive tax break to the GOP’s donor friends.

Republicans are trying to pull a fast one on the American people. The #GOPTaxScam does nothing for the middle class or working families. It lines the pockets of the wealthiest 1% and makes it easier for corporations to ship American jobs overseas.

The #GOPTaxScam will rain down trillions in tax breaks for wealthy Americans and corporations. And who will be forced to foot the bill?
 
-Middle-class families
-Seniors
-Students
-Veterans
 
This bill is a disgrace.

To recap, the #GOPTaxScam would:
Raise taxes on middle-class families
Kick 13 million ppl off health care
Hike premiums by 10%.
 
All so billionaires can have another unnecessary tax break. GOP proves yet again that they’d rather help their donors than their constituents.

Senate Republicans have taken the crooked #GOPTaxScam and made it deadly with another attack on the #ACA. If they succeed, 13 million Americans could lose health care. As we have before, we must & will defeat the latest GOP attempt to undermine the ACA.

Under #GOPTaxScam Child Tax Credit:

 A couple making $200,000 a year with 2 kids would get $3,200
 A single mom with 2 kids, working full time for min wage would see NO benefit

@HouseGOP, why are you leaving working families behind?
